articles.description: Manager Steven Schumacher hoping for a reaction from Tuesday's defeat and to improve on the showing when they met on the opening day of the season
articles.content:
Plymouth Argyle will be hoping to improve on their disappointing defeat at Cambridge United on Tuesday and show it was just a blip but will have to do so against the best team in the league.

articles.title: Paul Ince drops Reading FC transfer hint amid worrying news about Chelsea loanee - Berkshire Live
articles.description: New Reading FC interim manager Paul Ince oversaw a victory in his first game in charge of the club on Tuesday night as Royals saw off Birmingham City 2-1 in the Championship
articles.content:
Paul Ince says he could dip into the free agent market to sign a defender for Reading FC in the coming weeks.
